summary: AN ORDINANCE accepting electrical overhead and underground distribution easements over portions of Riverside Interurban Tracts; Knox's five Acre Garden Tracts; Charlston Addition; Bonnie View Park Addition; the northwest quarter of Section 8, Township 23 North, Range 4 East; vacated 2nd Avenue South; and the southeast quarter of Section 2, Township 26 North, Range 3 East, as described below and placing said easements under the jurisdiction of the City Light Department.
